Book Your Room Now!!Simple Introduction of AustraliaAustralia, officially the Commonwealth of Australia, is a country comprising the mainland of the Australian continent, the island of Tasmania and numerous smaller islands. Australia is the world's sixth-largest country by total area.TOP Tourist Attractions / Point of Interest of Australia1. Sydney - largest and the most populous city in Australia2. Perth3. Tasmania - well known for its wild life and beauty4. Fraser Island - the world largest sand island5. Kakadu National Park - one of the World Heritage sites in Australia6. Uluru - the largest monolith rock in the world7. Cairns - the main entry point for Great Barrier Reef visits8. Kangaroo Island9. Adelaide - one of the best planned cities in the world10. Jamison Valley - famous for its cable car tour11. Sydney Harbour12. Sydney Opera House13. Manly Beach, Sydney14. Eureka Skydeck 88, Melbourne15. Dandenong Ranges, Melbourne 16. St. Kilda Beach, Melbourne17. Wildlife Habitat Port Douglas18. Four Mile Beach, Port Douglas19. Tony's Tropical Tours, Port Douglas20. Silverswift Dive & Snorkel, Cairns21.
